description: This is a basic bodice sloper from the waist up. There is one dart at the waist. There is a total of 10 cm ease around the bustline included in the pattern.
This is a basic sloper for normal fitting pants with side pockets and a marker for where the zipper goes.
This is a basic straight skirt up to the knees. There are no darts at the waist.
This is a basic straight skirt with two darts on each side.
This is a slightly flared out skirt. It is based on SKIRT 1A but 8 cm wider at the bottom (2cm are added on each side front and back)
This is based on SKIRT 1A and is 8 cm narrower at the bottom. For this one you will probably need to have slit at the back to make it work.
This is a basic sloper for normal fitting pants with side pockets and a marker for where the zipper goes.
